statements: DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND date_occurred = '2021-09-15';
DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE date_occurred = '2022-01-01' AND number_of_injuries > 0;
DELETE FROM traffic_incidents WHERE id = 100 AND incident_type = 'Accident' AND timestamp = '2022-05-10 08:30:00';
DELETE FROM traffic_accidents WHERE is_fatal = TRUE AND location = 'Highway 101';
DELETE FROM IncidentResponse WHERE response_id IN (SELECT response_id FROM IncidentResponse WHERE personnel_id = 105);
